item.title: Build Skia on Archlinux
item.description: 1. Install depot-tools depot-tools includes gclient, git-cl, and Ninja. They are essential to build Skia. It’s quite easy to install depot-tools, for we have depot-tools in AUR, and even its binary version in archlinuxcn’s repo! yay depot-tools But notice that depot-tools is installed in /opt/depot_tools/. This directory is not in $PATH by default, so make sure to export PATH=/opt/depot_tools:$PATH before using it. Though in this way we should use it as root.
